ui.formSubtitle: Complete the form below to create your employment reference letter

intro.description: This tool helps you generate professional employment reference letters based on the German Arbeitszeugnis system.
intro.germanSystem: The German Arbeitszeugnis uses a unique coded language where positive-sounding statements have specific hidden meanings about an employee's performance. This system ensures legal compliance while allowing honest assessments.
howItWorks: Fill in the employee and company information
Select performance ratings for different categories
The system automatically generates appropriate coded language
Preview and download or print your reference letter

adequate.label: Adequate (4)
adequate.description: Below average performance, minimal requirements met

templates.opening: This is to certify that {name} was employed at {company} from {startDate} to {endDate}.
templates.closing: We wish {name} all the best for the future.
